channel.title: 彭博-市场
channel.description: 这是一个追踪彭博-市场news的种子

item.title: 欧元集团主席帕夏尔-多诺霍（Paschal Donohoe）对保加利亚在 2025 年加入欧元区的努力给予积极评价
item.description:
Eurogroup President Paschal Donohoe strikes a positive tone on Bulgaria’s efforts to join the euro area in 2025 https://t.co/AEdNRkfRAK

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 11, 2024

item.title: 欧元集团主席帕夏尔-多诺霍表示，欧盟成员国将在短期内各自为其国防需求提供资金，但从长远来看，可能会有集团范围内的手段
item.description:
UE member states will finance their defense needs individually in the short term, though there may be bloc-wide instruments in the longer term, Eurogroup President Paschal Donohoe says https://t.co/jPpICdNmLl

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 11, 2024

item.title: 消息人士称，中国万科在一笔新的海外贷款中面临着来自国内两大银行的阻力，这是对国家支持这家资金短缺的房地产巨头的一次重大考验。
item.description:
China Vanke is facing resistance from the nation’s two largest banks on a new offshore loan, sources say, in a major test of state support for the cash-strapped real-estate giant https://t.co/b2YzhkSNbT

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 11, 2024

item.title: 挪威政府预测今年大陆经济的扩张步伐将略有加快，并称大陆经济已步入正轨，将在困难时期保持较低的失业率。
item.description:
The Norwegian government forecast a slightly faster pace of expansion for the mainland economy this year, saying it was on the right track to keep unemployment low through difficult times https://t.co/1srWc7vfnv

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 11, 2024

item.title: Unicredit 经济学家埃里克-尼尔森（Erik Nielsen）表示，如果降息意味着欧洲央行的政策与美联储脱钩，那么欧洲央行就不应该担心降息问题。
item.description:
The ECB shouldn’t worry about cutting interest rates if that means decoupling its policy from the Fed, Unicredit economist Erik Nielsen says https://t.co/IaOMuusf0k

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 11, 2024

item.title: 美国天然气生产商 EQT 同意通过全股票交易回购其前子公司 Equitrans Midstream，交易价值约为 52 亿美元
item.description:
US natural gas producer EQT agrees to buy back its former unit Equitrans Midstream in an all-stock transaction valued at about $5.2 billion https://t.co/YVwpIKpdTb

item.title: 意大利工业部长阿道夫-乌尔索（Adolfo Urso）表示，半导体初创企业 Silicon Box 将在意大利投资 35 亿美元，在意大利北部建立芯片工厂。
item.description:
Semiconductors startup Silicon Box will invest $3.5 billion in Italy to build a chip factory in the north of the country, Industry Minister Adolfo Urso says https://t.co/gSX3Ss31br

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 11, 2024

item.title: 香港最高安全官员试图向立法者保证，香港金融中心的商业活动不会受到政府正在快速推进的安全立法中新增的外部干扰罪的影响。
item.description:
Hong Kong’s top security official sought to reassure lawmakers that business activities in the finance hub won’t be affected by new external interference offenses included in security legislation being fast-tracked by the government https://t.co/O4iiMnm4zE

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 11, 2024

item.title: 一位诺贝尔奖获得者的理论支持押注更便宜的股票，并为资金经理们树立了一个基准。但数字一直在变。这有多重要？
item.description:
A Nobel laureate's theory supports betting on cheaper stocks and sets a benchmark for money managers. But the numbers keep changing. How much does it matter? https://t.co/qA22MypHfA

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 11, 2024

item.title: 新消息：英镑今年的表现优于全球 90% 以上的货币，原因是有迹象表明该国经济的发展好于预期。
item.description:
NEW: The British pound is beating more than 90% of the world's currencies this year, on signs the nation’s economy is holding up better than expected https://t.co/RxzZuVi5yR pic.twitter.com/Q4TyjH1ptF

— Bloomberg UK (@BloombergUK) March 11, 2024

item.title: 欧洲央行理事会成员彼得-卡齐米尔认为，欧洲央行不应在 6 月前降息，因为官员们需要更多数据来确定通胀已得到控制。
item.description:
The ECB shouldn’t lower interest rates before June as officials need more data to be sure that inflation has been tamed, according to Governing Council member Peter Kazimir https://t.co/zJup7HlHNB

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 11, 2024

item.title: 俄罗斯任命一名经纪人，负责在乌克兰入侵后受到国际制裁的俄罗斯和外国投资者之间进行资产交换
item.description:
Russia appoints a broker to conduct swaps of assets between Russian and foreign investors caught up in international sanctions imposed after the invasion of Ukraine https://t.co/HjC8rvuzHo

item.title: 德国财政部长克里斯蒂安-林德纳表示，克里斯塔琳娜-格奥尔基耶娃是 "领导 "国际货币基金组织的 "不二人选"，并公开承认德国支持其连任
item.description:
Kristalina Georgieva is “exactly the right person to steer” the IMF, German Finance Minister Christian Lindner says, openly acknowledging his country’s backing for a second term https://t.co/gFjWB1Ny2n

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 11, 2024

item.title: 美国商务部长吉娜-雷蒙多（Gina Raimondo）表示，美国可能会进一步加强对中国获取尖端半导体技术的控制
item.description:
The US could further tighten controls on China's access to sophisticated semiconductor technologies, Commerce Secretary Gina Raimondo says https://t.co/NoJuUPwgSx

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 11, 2024

item.title: 中国股市在立法者年度政策会议期间录得涨幅，这是六年来首次出现这种上扬。
item.description:
China’s equity market registered a gain for the duration of its legislators’ annual policy meeting, the first such upturn in six years. https://t.co/YUxL9eH17j

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 11, 2024

item.title: 热带风暴菲利波正逼近莫桑比克海岸，预计将于周二在港口城市贝拉南部登陆。

Tropical Storm Filipo is bearing down on Mozambique’s coast, where it’s forecast to make landfall south of the port city of Beira on Tuesday https://t.co/2tUQeZLAac

item.title: 日本央行周一没有买入 ETF，出人意料地背离了其在早盘市场下跌 2% 或更多时买入 ETF 的一贯做法。
item.description:
The Bank of Japan refrained from buying ETFs on Monday, a surprise departure from its usual playbook of buying when the market falls 2% or more in the morning session https://t.co/kK2M3Rly3E

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 11, 2024

item.title: 波兰总统安杰伊-杜达将在与美国总统乔-拜登的会谈中提议北约成员国将国防开支的最低水平提高到经济产出的 3
item.description:
Polish President Andrzej Duda will propose that NATO member states raise the minimum level of defense spending to 3% of economic output in his talks with US President Joe Biden https://t.co/P8gjXdsOzE
